subject: From the Desk of Mrs. Helen
body:
From the Desk of Mrs. Helen Ubah
Zenith Bank PLC
Address: Plot 87 Ajose Adeogun St,
Lagos Victoria Island,
Dear: ,
This is to quickly inform you that we received a message from one Mr. Andrew McCaul from U.S.A., stating that you authorized him to receive your compensation fund $350,000.00 USD as your next of kin and the United Nations said we should confirm from you if this is true before releasing the fund to him.
All we need from you is to tell us if you authorize Andrew McCaul from U.S.A., to receive your fund as your next of kin so that we will proceed and send the fund $350,000.00 USD to him as soon as possible.
We are waiting to hear from you to enable us know if this is true or false.
Your urgent response is required
Thanks,
Mrs. Helen Ubah
Phone: +2348108930898

subject: Re:   From the Desk of Mrs. Helen
body:
Dear Mrs. Helen Ubah,

I did not authorize anyone named Andrew to receive any funds on my behalf. I am not sure how he could claim to be my next of kin as I have no relatives by that name. 

Please do not release any funds to this person. I would appreciate it if you could provide me with more information about this situation.

Thank you for your attention to this matter.

Best wishes,
Michael
